enemies

Class ShootyGuy

  • java.lang.Object
    • gameMembers.Drawable
      • gameMembers.EnvironmentMember
        • enemies.BasicEnemy
          • enemies.ShootyGuy

  • public class ShootyGuy
extends BasicEnemy
    This class is an enemy class for the SpaghettiMan game.
    ShootyGuy is the only character who shoots stuff; all of the other enemies do other things like run after the main character.
    Author:
    Hughes

        public ShootyGuy(float x,

        The only constructor for the class. It defines an x and y location for the shooty guy.
        Parameters:
        x - the x location of this character
        y - the y location of this character

    • Method Detail

      • draw

        public void draw(org.newdawn.slick.Graphics g)
        Description copied from class: EnvironmentMember
        This method is inherited from the Drawable class. This implementation takes a Graphics object when called and uses it to draw the object on the screen. The intended use of this method is to be able to draw an entire ArrayList or Drawable[] and draw the entire thing using a simple loop:

        for(Drawable d : drawables)
        d.draw
        Specified by:
        draw in class BasicEnemy
        Parameters:
        g - the Graphics object required to draw

      • update

        public void update(Point p)
        Description copied from class: BasicEnemy
        update

        This method should be implemented in the subclass so that all Enemies can have their locations updated. For now, the only thing they need is the location of the player character (obstacles?)

        Specified by:
        update in class BasicEnemy
        Parameters:
        p - the Point location of the player character
